instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00165: What is 820-00165? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.PP3V3_SUS: What is PP3V3_SUS? The "PP3V3_SUS" rail on a MacBook logic board is a power rail that provides a 3.3-volt supply to the suspend-to-RAM (S3 state) components. .
definitions.PP3V3_S5: What is PP3V3_S5? PP3V3_S5 is a 3.3v power rail when the system is in an S5 soft off power state.
definitions.PM_SLP_S4_L: What is PM_SLP_S4_L? PM_SLP_S4_L is a signal that puts the system into an S4 suspend to disk sleep state when it is low(_L means signal is asserted when voltage is low).
definitions.PP3V42_G3H: What is PP3V42_G3H? PP3V42_G3H is a power rail present when the machine is in a G3H global system hardware off state and is the first rail that should be generated in Macbooks that use it. .
definitions.PP5V_S5: What is PP5V_S5? This is a 5v power rail that is present when the machine is in an S5 soft off state..
definitions.PPVRTC_G3H: What is PPVRTC_G3H? PPVRTC_G3H is a 3.3v power rail for the RTC circuit present when the machine is in a G3H global system hardware off state. .
definitions.PPDCIN_G3H: What is PPDCIN_G3H? PPDCIN_G3H Is a power rail that comes directly from the laptop charger..
definitions.PP5V_S4RS3: What is PP5V_S4RS3? PP5V_S4RS3 is a 5v power rail present when the machine is in an S4 suspend to disk state..
definitions.PP1V05_SUS: What is PP1V05_SUS? The PP1V05_SUS signal in the MacBook schematic is a power rail that supplies 1.05 volts, typically used in a suspended (SUS) state of the laptop. This state is a low-power mode where essential system functions are maintained, but the majority of the system is powered down..
definitions.P5VS4RS3_EN: What is P5VS4RS3_EN? PP5VS4RS3_EN is a signal that enables the PP5V_S4RS3 power rail. When you see _EN in front of a signal name, it means that it is enabling whatever comes before the _EN when the signal is high..
definitions.3V3_S5: What is 3V3_S5? 3V3_S5 and PP3V3_S5 are interchangeable, see definition for PP3V3_S5. .
definitions.5V_S5: What is 5V_S5? 5V_S5 is an abbreviation for “PP5V_S5” which is a 5v power rail that is present when the machine is in an S5 state. .

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a <SIGNAL>PP3V3_SUS</SIGNAL> missing
threads.message:
HI, 

Board is water damaged. 


<SIGNAL>PPDCIN_G3H</SIGNAL>, PPBUS, <SIGNAL>PP3V42_G3H</SIGNAL>, <SIGNAL>PPVRTC_G3H</SIGNAL>, <SIGNAL>PP5V_S5</SIGNAL>, <SIGNAL>PP3V3_S5</SIGNAL>, 


<SIGNAL>PP3V3_SUS</SIGNAL>, <SIGNAL>PP5V_S4RS3</SIGNAL>, <SIGNAL>PP3V3_S4SW_SNS</SIGNAL>, <SIGNAL>PP1V05_SUS</SIGNAL> note present. 


Also ALL SYS PWR 0V. <SIGNAL>P5VS4RS3_EN</SIGNAL> not present and <SIGNAL>PM_SLP_S4_L</SIGNAL> too. 



NO way to boot it.. CPU shorted? 


Thank you in advance

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a <SIGNAL>PP3V3_SUS</SIGNAL> missing
threads.message: P.S: FIrst PPBUS was 8.2 and SMC had been changed so now it's 8,6

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a <SIGNAL>PP3V3_SUS</SIGNAL> missing
threads.message:
Reballing SMC was good enough, I suppose.
Must be done always on liquid damaged board.

Do you get <SIGNAL>3V3_S5</SIGNAL>/SUS now?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a <SIGNAL>PP3V3_SUS</SIGNAL> missing
threads.message: i get S5 rails but not SUS ( pulsing from 0,2 to 0.7V)

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a <SIGNAL>PP3V3_SUS</SIGNAL> missing
threads.message:
FInally i reballed and changed it's own SMC ( other one was from donor board, same <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>). Now all reails <SIGNAL>5V_S5</SIGNAL>, SUS are pulsating.). I gues that SMC is fucked and donor one is fucked too?

And green light now turn orange after 1 min aprox.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a <SIGNAL>PP3V3_SUS</SIGNAL> missing
